name: Gacha Dreamz Pre Acess
description:
this game still in development, still ALOT of stuff to do

In this version have:

- cool title screen

- shirt, pants, belts customization

- cool color palet mechanic

- a cool pre-acess version

In the full version will have:

- more and more clothes and body customization

- events

- body customization

- Ilimited adjust for alot of stuff

- studio mode

- keyframe mode in studio mode

- and MUCH more
